amendment.description: To direct the Director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to conduct an investigation of the Shockoe Creek drain field in Richmond, Virginia, to determine means of preventing future damage from floods and other natural disasters.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3610 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
